text: Warren Griffin III (born November 10, 1970 in Long Beach, California) is an American rapper, DJ, and producer. Warren G has been nominated for two awards including Grammy Award for "Best Rap Performance By A Duo Or Group" for his song "Regulate" with Nate Dogg. He was also nominated for a Grammy Award for "Best Rap Solo Performance" for his song "This D.J." in 1995. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 1994 Regulate... title: Warren G
